archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.1.9b: b) used to help determine programmes of work in information security (e.g. running security projects, establishing new security initiatives or, developing an information security programme or information security management system (ISMS))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
